trans-unit.source: Contributions are welcome and much appreciated. Every little bit helps. You can contribute by improving the documentation, adding missing features, and fixing bugs. You can also help out by reviewing and commenting on existing issues.
trans-unit.target: Contributions are welcome and much appreciated. Every little bit helps. You can contribute by improving the documentation, adding missing features, and fixing bugs. You can also help out by reviewing and commenting on existing issues.

trans-unit.source: Inspired by Andrew Nacin’s Simple Footnotes WordPress plugin.
trans-unit.target: Inspired by Andrew Nacin’s Simple Footnotes WordPress plugin.

trans-unit.source: Originally authored by Stuart Langridge, February 2014, and subsequently enhanced by members of the Pelican community, including Justin Mayer, who re-packaged it for publication to PyPI.
trans-unit.target: Originally authored by Stuart Langridge, February 2014, and subsequently enhanced by members of the Pelican community, including Justin Mayer, who re-packaged it for publication to PyPI.

trans-unit.source: Pelican plugin to add footnotes to articles and pages
trans-unit.target: 記事やページに脚注を追加するためのPelicanプラグイン

trans-unit.source: Simple Footnotes is a Pelican plugin for adding footnotes to articles and pages.
trans-unit.target: Simple Footnotesは、記事やページに脚注を追加するためのPelicanプラグインです。

trans-unit.source: This plugin, and its dependent package html5lib, can be installed via:
trans-unit.target: This plugin, and its dependent package html5lib , can be installed via:

trans-unit.source: This should work with any content format (reST, Markdown, et cetera), because it looks for [ref] and [/ref] once the conversion to HTML has happened.
trans-unit.target: This should work with any content format (reST, Markdown, et cetera), because it looks for [ref] and [/ref] once the conversion to HTML has happened.
これは、大まかには次のように表示されます。

trans-unit.source: To start contributing to this plugin, review the Contributing to Pelican documentation, beginning with the Contributing Code section.
trans-unit.target: To start contributing to this plugin, review the Contributing to Pelican documentation, beginning with the Contributing Code section.

trans-unit.source: When writing an article or page, add a footnote like this:
trans-unit.target: 記事やページを書くときは、このように脚注を付けましょう。
と、ここに脚注があります。
